title: Remove copyright year text from UI

requirements.text: Remove the visible copyright text "© 2026" (and any dynamic equivalent like "© {currentYear}") from the app UI, including the footer in the Closing section.
acceptanceCriteria: The Closing section footer no longer renders any "©" + year text (e.g., "© 2026" or "© 2024").
No other screen (prompt, reveal, hero, message, games, nav) displays "© 2026" anywhere in the UI.
The page layout remains visually consistent after removal (no awkward extra spacing or empty footer element).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything inside frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Changing any other Valentine copy, layout, or game mechanics beyond removing the copyright text.
Adding new backend logic or persistence.
